sense.gloss: to burn, to kindle, to light (a fire), to make (a fire)
to heat (a bath), to light (a stove), to stoke (a boiler)

sdata.j: ハワイってさ、↑暖炉↑↓だんろ↓つきの↑家↑↓いえ↓が↑多↑↓おお↓いじゃない？あっちも↑朝夕↑↓あさゆう↓は↑冷↑↓ひ↓えるから、↑寒↑↓さむ↓がりの↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑暖炉↑↓だんろ↓を|↑焚↑↓た↓く|んだ。
sdata.e: Hawai, y'know, has a lot of houses with fireplaces doesn't it? The mornings and evenings over there get cold as well so people who feel the cold light fires.
